page.title: 17Education
page.content: One recent study was on the subject of government and the children began the work with a visit to the Town Council. Then they visited the District Council. They were allowed to hold a mock council meeting in the Council Chamber at the County Buildings. They followed this with a visit to Parliament, and invited their local member of Parliament into the school for 'Question Time'. Another study was concerned with the police force and a police woman spent a term working with the children.She organised visits to the local police station,to police training centres,and to the Thames River police.The children visited the Law Courts and enacted a mock trial with themselves taking the place of the various people in the court room.
